abstract.help: The Science Idea abstract should clearly communicate the Science Ideaâ€™s objectives, relevance, expected outcomes, and potential impact, serving as a high-level overview of the Science Idea's essential points. The abstract should be succinct yet detailed enough to convey the essence of the Science Idea, highlighting its innovation and relevance to the field. The text should be a maximum of 250 words.
abstract.helper: Please enter the abstract of your Science Idea. This field allows latex syntax. - Word count {{current}} / {{max}}

addProposal.success: Science Idea added with unique identifier
addProposal.toolTip: Click to add a new Science Idea.
addProposal.warning: Please wait whilst we create a new Science Idea.

addTarget.toolTip: Will add the target to the list associated with this Science Idea.

assignBtn.toolTip: Assign Science Ideas to a review panel

assignProposals.label: Assign Science Ideas
assignProposals.toolTip: Click to assign Science Ideas to the panel.
assignProposals.warning: Please wait whilst we assign the Science Ideas.

changeProposal.label: Change Science Idea's type?
changeProposal.content1: You are about to change the type of your Science Idea.
changeProposal.content2: Some data specific to the Science Idea type may be lost.

conflict.tooltip: Indicate whether there is a conflict of interest with this Science Idea

decisionComments.help: Comments provided by the chairperson when making a decision on the Science Idea.

displayProposal.warning: Please wait whilst we load the selected Science Idea.

email.help: The email is a required field. The investigator will be invited to participate in this Science Idea using this email, so please ensure it is correct.

invitation.subject: Science Idea invitation.
invitation.body: You have been invited to contribute to Science Idea {{id}}

homeBtn.title: Science Ideas
homeBtn.tooltip: Returns to the list of Science Ideas

submit.help: Check to indicate that this individual can submit, edit and view the Science Idea.

edit.help: Check to indicate that this individual can edit and view the Science Idea.

view.help: Check to indicate that this individual can view the Science Idea.

phdThesis.help: Check to indicate that part of the data from this Science Idea will be used towards a PhD thesis.

pi.help: Check to indicate that this individual is the Principal Investigator of this Science Idea.

proposal.error: Unable to retrieve the Science Idea from the server

desc.4: These projects require more than one Science Idea cycle to complete (e.g., long-term monitoring campaigns) but are too short in overall observing time, limited in observatory resources and/or scientific scope to qualify as a KSP.

proposalAttribute.help: One or more of these optional attributes may be selected to further refine the Science Idea

proposals.empty: THERE ARE NO SCIENCE IDEAS TO BE DISPLAYED
proposals.label: Science Ideas

proposalType.help: Select from the options below the most appropriate type classification for the Science Idea. This can be changed later if needed, however be aware that this may affect information previously entered.

members.empty: THERE ARE NO INVESTIGATORS ASSOCIATED WITH THIS SCIENCE IDEA

reviewProposal.submit: Submit the review of the Science Idea
reviewProposal.title: Review Science Idea

reviewProposalList.title: Review Science Ideas
reviewProposalList.toolTip: List of Science Ideas for review

saveBtn.tooltip: Saves the Science Idea in the current state to the database

scienceCategory.help: Select a category that best describes the science of your Science Idea.

scienceSubCategory.help: SUB-CATEGORY: Select a sub-category that best describes your Science Idea.

submitBtn.tooltip: Progress the Science Ideas to the submitted state

targets.empty: There are no targets associated with this Science Idea

uploadCsvBtn.uploadSuccessMsg: All targets in file have been uploaded into the Science Idea

validationBtn.tooltip: Performs enhanced validation upon the Science Idea

0.desc: This page allows users to provide the title and Science Idea category

1.desc: Principal investigators should ensure that co-investigators are registered through the SKAO portal. Co-investigators with pending status will be removed from the Science Idea during validation of a submitted Science Idea.

2.desc: This page allows the user to provide general information about the Science Idea.

3.desc: Upload a Science justification for this Science Idea in a portable document format (pdf).

4.desc: Select a category to associate target(s) with this Science Idea.

6.desc: Upload a Technical justification for this Science Idea in a portable document format (pdf).

7.noObservations: IT IS NOT CURRENTLY POSSIBLE TO ADD DATA PRODUCTS AS THERE ARE NO TARGET / OBSERVATION COMBINATIONS FOR THIS SCIENCE IDEA
7.noProducts: THERE ARE NO DATA PRODUCTS ASSOCIATED WITH THIS SCIENCE IDEA

9.desc: Provide a title of your Science Idea. Science Idea sub-types below are optional.

11.desc: Science Ideas where the user is listed as either principal investigator or co-investigator.

page.noObservations: NO OBSERVATION SETUP IS ASSOCIATED WITH THIS SCIENCE IDEA
